module.name: footprint_definition
module.keywords: module, footprint, breakout, package, padstack, footprint breakout

abstract.p: the representation of a footprint, including functional and geometric; and representation of a breakout pattern associated with a footprint. Also provided is support to reference a part feature that an aspect of a footprint is dependent upon.
the hierarchical footprint definition providing support for complex arrangements and patterns.
abstract.li: footprints, optionally linking the features of a part with corresponding padstacks;
geometric models of footprint and breakout patterns;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a footprint, including functional and geometric; and representation of a breakout pattern associated with a footprint. Also provided is support to reference a part feature that an aspect of a footprint is dependent upon.
The footprint definition is hierarchical providing support for complex arrangements and patterns.

inscope.li: footprints, optionally linking the features of a part with corresponding padstacks;
geometric models of footprint and breakout patterns;
items within the scope of application module Package, ISO/TS 10303-1707;
items within the scope of application module Part template 2d shape, ISO/TS 10303-1716.
